text: CPSC 340/540 T utorial 1 Winter 2023 Term 1 Assignment 1 Due Friday Sept 15th Slides Credit: To various previous T A ’s of this course Topics (review for assignment 1) ● Linear Algebra ● Probability ● Calculus ● Algorithms and Data Structures ● Python Linear Algebra Some resources ● Mark’s notes: https://www .cs.ubc.ca/~schmidtm/Documents/2009_Notes_LinearAlgebra.pdf ● Boyd and V andenberghe’s Convex Optimization Appendix A.1 and A.5: https://web.stanford.edu/~boyd/cvxbook/bv_cvxbook.pdf Probability Some resources ● Mark’s notes: https://www .cs.ubc.ca/~schmidtm/Courses/Notes/probability.pdf and https://www .cs.ubc.ca/~schmidtm/Courses/Notes/probabilitySlides.pdf ● Murphy’s Probabilistic Machine Learning Chapter 2: https://github.com/probml/pml-book/releases/latest/download/book1.pdf ● Chen’s Probability Cheat Sheet : https://github.com/wzchen/probability_cheatsheet/tree/master Law of Total Probability Calculus Some resources ● Boyd and V andenberghe Convex Optimization Appendix A.4: https://web.stanford.edu/~boyd/cvxbook/bv_cvxbook.pdf ● Plotting is a quick way to check your answers: https://www .wolframalpha.com/ ● Derivative test: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derivative_test ● W ork out on paper prior to coding ● Could check coding questions on gradients with autodiff Algorithms, Data Structures and Data Exploration Some resources ● Introduction to Algorithms ● Past CPSC 221 Material Python Some resources ● https://cs231n.github.io/python-numpy-tutorial/ ● T utorial 1 python notebooks (two attached with slides)Questions?
